website_summaries.verdict: Batman is at his best when battling a baddie, and there’s no one creepier than Killer Croc. This is an affordable, sturdy, and cool-looking set of Batman figures.
pros: Includes armored Batman with cloth cape and Killer Croc villain

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy large
customer_reviews.text: These toys are larger than I had anticipated. This is great news for the cost! My 2 year old son loves these! Very sturdy which is good for a little rough boy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Batman Action Figure
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old Bday gift for a Batman obsessed little cousin. Made his day. Nice size batman, light action, body moves, armor change, you cant beat this!
customer_reviews.author: MarquessofPink

customer_reviews.title: Bat man figure
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was very excited opening this bat man figure for his eighth birthday. No damage, voice worked great, all parts were included. He said it's (what I wanted!)
customer_reviews.author: kathy barber

customer_reviews.title: Just what he wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find this set as my grandson requested the Croc for his birthday. Traditional 12" figures to add to his collection. Nice packaging.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Durab
customer_reviews.text: My three year old son loves this, and I can't blame him. It's really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Tollison

customer_reviews.title: What a Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: Batman comes with armor and speaks! nice size and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Weeta

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for a 3yr old! My son is obsessed with it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Decent gift! Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my cousin in law son birthday turning three. He loves it! Came with attachable pieces
customer_reviews.author: Gia Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great Batman action figure!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent action figure. Love it! I love everything Batman and this is a great addition to my collection of The Caped Crusader action figures.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: The Batman figure was super cool. Killer Croc looks bad A**
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Batman
customer_reviews.text: My son love it! Look out the size, its pretty big!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: It could do a better snap in some of the parts
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good toy just some of the armor parts won’t stays how they supposed to be the shoulders armored parts exactly, other than that my son loved
customer_reviews.author: Humberto N.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and undamaged
customer_reviews.text: So far so good it's a Christmas present so not played with yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Critic

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Another great addition to my son's super hero collection. The armor doesn't all stay on well and I'm pretty sure the pieces have been lost in various parts of the house. Overall it's still a quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bumgarner

customer_reviews.title: Great large size set for a kid
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this set and it has held up really well
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Larger and better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son loves! Pieces for the armor are very durable. It is sometimes a challenge for his little fingers to put on the leg armor, but is an easy assist from me. Larger and better quality than expected. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!!! Best buy ever!!! Thought i was taking a gamble with this one. I thought it was going to be cheaper made than it is. Its durable. Its vivid in color. And to be homest the picture does not do it justice. Its a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Armor pieces fall off easily.
customer_reviews.text: The grey armor pieces fall off easily, but it made a great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Marra

customer_reviews.title: Grandson will love it
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging not damaged will be a great gift for the grandson
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Great figure with or without armor ! Lights and sounds are very cool ! One of the best Batman 12 inch figures ever !
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale for $5. It was definitely worth that! Bigger than typical action figures, and it comes with armor accessories and talks. My son has had it for a year now, and it is still working great. Probably his favorite action figure, and he doesn't even watch Batman. Its good quality. He hasn't lost any limbs in all this time. The same can not be said for most other action figures he has.
customer_reviews.author: Darshling

product_meta.title: DC Comics Batman Missions Batman & Killer Croc 12" Figure 2-Pack
product_meta.description: Style:Batman & Killer CrocEnjoy total combat play with an oversized Killer Croc versus a 12" scale Batman in one pack! Each of the DC action figures has realistic details and iconic battle suits plus 11 points of articulation. Pit Super-Villain against Super Hero and fight to the finish!
feature_bullets: DC total combat two-pack with Super-Villain and Super hero together
12" scale Batman and oversized 12" scale killer Croc
Each has 11 points of articulation for epic battle play and posing
Batman comes with a cloth cape and an armored bat suit
Killer Croc has massive reptilian claws, feet and musculature

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars319 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
